description: Snapdragon (Sheoke Sanada) is a Japanese supervillain in the Marvel Comics Universe.  She first appeared in Marvel Fanfare vol. 1 #12 (1984) and was created by Ralph Macchio and George Pérez.
name: Snapdragon
powers: Snapdragon possesses no superhuman abilities other than a protective suit
a helmet with infrared sensors.  She is a master hand-to-hand combatant
skilled with various forms of weaponry.
